intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: SwissKeyboard (« nous ») prend la protection de tes données au sérieux. Cette politique de confidentialité décrit comment nous traitons les données personnelles dans notre application clavier mobile et sur notre site web. Nous respectons la loi fédérale suisse sur la protection des données (nLPD) ainsi que le RGPD, le cas échéant.

Lorsqu'un traitement serveur est nécessaire, les données sont transmises de manière chiffrée et supprimées immédiatement après traitement. Nous utilisons exclusivement des serveurs en Suisse.

intro.title: Introducziun
intro.text: SwissKeyboard («nus») prenda la protecziun da tias datas a moda serieusa. Questa decleraziun da protecziun da datas descriva co nus elavurain datas persunalas en nossa app da tastatura mobila e sin nossa pagina d'internet. Nus respectain la lescha federala svizra davart la protecziun da datas (nLPD) sco er il GDPR, nua ch'el è applitgabel.

controller.title: Post responsabel
controller.text: Responsabel per l'elavuraziun da datas è:

voiceData.title: Datas da vusch
voiceData.text: Cura che ti utiliseschas la reconuschientscha vocala, vegn tes audio elavurà per al convertir en text. Las datas audio na vegnan betg memorisadas e vegnan stizzadas immediat suenter la conversiun.

analytics.title: Analisa da l'utilisaziun
analytics.text: Nus rimnain datas d'utilisaziun anonimisadas (p.ex. dialect tschernì, durada da la sessiun) per meglierar l'app. Questas datas na permettan betg da t'identifitgar.

betaEmail.title: Program beta (e-mail)
betaEmail.text: Sche ti t'annunzias per il program beta, memorisain nus tia adressa d'e-mail per t'infurmar davart actualisaziuns. Ti pos ta disdir da mintga mument.

processing.title: Elavuraziun sin l'apparat vs. server
processing.text: Nossa reconuschientscha vocala cun IA funcziuna uschè bler che pussaivel directamain sin tes apparat. Sche ina elavuraziun da server è necessaria, vegnan las datas transmessas en moda criptada e stizzadas immediat suenter l'elavuraziun. Nus utilisain exclusivamain servers en Svizra.

storage.title: Memorisaziun & conservaziun
storage.text: L'app memorisescha parameters ed in diczigunari persunal localmain sin tes apparat. Questas datas na bandunan betg tes apparat. E-mails dal program beta vegnan conservads maximalmain fin a la fin dal program beta.

thirdParty.title: Servetschs da terzs
thirdParty.text: Nus na duvrain betg raits da reclama e na partain betg tias datas cun terzs per intent da marketing. Per la distribuziun da l'app pon vegnir utilisads ils suandants servetschs:
thirdParty.services: Apple App Store / Google Play Store (distribuziun da l'app), hosting provider svizzer (infrastructura da servers)

meta.title: SwissKeyboard - Voice Keyboard for Swiss Dialects
meta.description: SwissKeyboard is the first voice keyboard that understands Swiss dialects. Züritüütsch, Bärndütsch, Baseldütsch and more – Swiss-Made AI for your phone.

hero.title: Stop Typing. Start Talking.
hero.subtitle: SwissKeyboard is a voice-to-text keyboard for your phone. Tap the microphone, speak naturally, and watch your words become text – instantly. Write messages, emails, and notes 3x faster than typing. And unlike Big Tech, we actually understand Swiss German.

accessible.title: Accessible to all
accessible.description: For people with limited mobility, dyslexia, or visual impairments – speaking is easier.

problem.sectionTitle: The Problem with Current Voice Typing
problem.description: Your phone already has voice typing built in. So why isn't everyone using it? Because it doesn't work – not if you speak Swiss German. You tap the microphone, say something in Züritüütsch, and Apple "corrects" it into High German. Or gibberish. Your dialect becomes an error.

voiceToText.description: Voice typing that understands Züritüütsch, Bärndütsch, Baseldütsch, and every dialect in between.

aiRecognition.title: Swiss-Made AI

speed.title: Fast & Accurate
speed.description: Speak at your normal pace. Your words appear as text – accurate and instant.

naturalSpeech.title: Hyper-local accuracy
naturalSpeech.description: We don't just recognize "Swiss German." We understand the differences between Bern, Zurich, Basel, and beyond.

everyRegion.title: Works everywhere
everyRegion.description: Messages, WhatsApp, Email, Notes, social media – every text field on your phone. One keyboard for everything.

saveTime.title: Continuously learning
saveTime.description: Our AI improves with every update, trained on how Swiss people actually speak.

worksEverywhere.description: Built in Switzerland with Swiss data protection values. No foreign servers. No hidden data collection.

focusedExperience.description: No Big Tech ownership. No Silicon Valley investors. We build for users, not advertisers.

communityDriven.description: Your feedback shapes the product. We build together, not behind closed doors.

cultural.description: For anyone who finds typing difficult – limited mobility, dyslexia, visual impairments. Speaking is easier.

accessibility.title: Anyone tired of "corrections"
accessibility.description: If you've ever watched your phone turn your dialect into High German or gibberish – this is for you.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: SwissKeyboard ("we", "us") takes the protection of your data seriously. This privacy policy describes how we process personal data in our mobile keyboard app and on our website. We comply with the Swiss Federal Act on Data Protection (nFADP) and the GDPR where applicable.

voiceData.title: Voice Data
voiceData.text: When you use voice recognition, your audio is processed to convert it to text. Audio data is not stored and is immediately deleted after conversion.

analytics.title: Usage Analytics
analytics.text: We collect anonymized usage data (e.g., selected dialect, session duration) to improve the app. This data cannot be traced back to you.

betaEmail.title: Beta Program (Email)
betaEmail.text: If you sign up for the beta program, we store your email address to inform you about updates. You can unsubscribe at any time.

processing.title: On-Device vs. Server Processing
processing.text: Our AI voice recognition runs as much as possible directly on your device. When server processing is required, data is transmitted encrypted and deleted immediately after processing. We exclusively use servers in Switzerland.

storage.title: Storage & Retention
storage.text: The app stores settings and a personal dictionary locally on your device. This data does not leave your device. Beta emails are retained at most until the beta program concludes.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: We do not use advertising networks and do not share your data with third parties for marketing purposes. The following services may be used for app distribution:
thirdParty.services: Apple App Store / Google Play Store (app distribution), Swiss hosting provider (server infrastructure)

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: Under the nFADP and GDPR, you have the following rights:

list.access: Right to access your stored data
list.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
list.deletion: Right to deletion of your data
list.complaint: Right to file a complaint with the competent authority (FDPIC)

contact.text: For data protection inquiries, you can reach us at:
